title: I Want to Learn From You
detail_text: <:th_ch0209/>Umi-san, you’re the one who comes up with the lyrics for μ’s songs.... right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>I’m not the only one who comes up with them, but for the most part, yes<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I.... love the lyrics on μ’s songs. I feel energized.... whenever I hear them<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>I-, is that so? Fufu, I’m glad to hear that<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>When I write lyrics.... I want to be able to write them as wonderful as yours, Umi-san. So.... please let me learn from you. Rina-chan’s board「Bowing」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Eeeh!? Even if you ask me to teach you, I’m not sure how....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I heard from Honoka-san and Kotori-san.... that you have a book of poems. They said that.... it’s the secret to your lyrics, Umi-san....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Po-.... No, I do have that, but.... Honoka~~~....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I want to see it.... so I can learn from it. Can I see it? No?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>I-, I don’t know what to do when you look at me with those eyes~~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
